description.value:
**Plugin Pack to monitor Aruba controllers and access points via SNMP.**

Available host templates and related services:

|Net-Aruba-Standard-Controller-SNMP|
|---|
|Cpu|
|Memory|
|Storage|
|Hardware|
|Controller-Status|
|License|

|Net-Aruba-Standard-Ap-SNMP|
|---|
|Ap-Ssid-Statistics|
|Ap-Status|

Available service discovery rules:

* Net-Aruba-Standard-SNMP-Packet-Errors-Name
* Net-Aruba-Standard-SNMP-Traffic-Name

Deprecated host template:

* Net-Aruba-Standard-SNMP

Deprecated service templates:

* Net-Aruba-Standard-Ap-Connections-SNMP
* Net-Aruba-Standard-Ap-Users-SNMP

This pack provides a host discovery rule.

**Plugin pack pour superviser les contrôleurs et les points d\'accès Aruba via SNMP.**

Modèles d\'hôte disponibles et leurs services :

|Net-Aruba-Standard-Controller-SNMP|
|---|
|Cpu|
|Memory|
|Storage|
|Hardware|
|Controller-Status|
|License|

|Net-Aruba-Standard-Ap-SNMP|
|---|
|Ap-Ssid-Statistics|
|Ap-Status|

Règles de découverte de services disponibles :

* Net-Aruba-Standard-SNMP-Packet-Errors-Name
* Net-Aruba-Standard-SNMP-Traffic-Name

Modèle d\'hôte obsolète :

* Net-Aruba-Standard-SNMP

Modèles de service obsolète :

* Net-Aruba-Standard-Ap-Connections-SNMP
* Net-Aruba-Standard-Ap-Users-SNMP

Ce pack fournit une règle de découverte d\'hôte.

information.monitoring_procedure:
# Monitoring procedure ## Prerequisites ### Centreon Plugin Install this plugin on each needed poller: # yum install centreon-plugin-Network-Switchs-Aruba-Standard-Snmp ### Configure SNMP Follow constructor procedure to enable and configure SNMP on the equipment. Read *[this guide](https://documentation.centreon.com/docs/centreon-plugins/en/latest/user/guide.html#snmp)* to troubleshoot SNMP problems. ## Centreon Configuration ### Create hosts using the appropriate template Both controllers and access points can be monitored using specific host templates. Be sure to have with you the following information: * Read-only SNMP community * IP Address of the equipment #### Controller Go to *Configuration > Hosts* and click *Add*. Then, fill the form as shown by the following table:
Field Value

Name

Name of the controller

Alias

Description

IP Address / DNS

IP address of the controller

SNMP Community & Version

Community and version of the SNMP agent

Monitored from

Poller used to monitor

Templates

Net-Aruba-Standard-Controller-SNMP-custom
Check the *Create Services linked to the Template too* box and click on the *Save* button. The following services will be created: * Cpu * Memory * Storage * Hardware * License * Controller-Status The following rules are linked to this host template: * Net-Aruba-Standard-SNMP-Packet-Errors-Name * Net-Aruba-Standard-SNMP-Traffic-Name #### Access Point Go to *Configuration > Hosts* and click *Add*. Then, fill the form as shown by the following table:
Field Value

Name

Name of the access point

Alias

Description

IP Address / DNS

IP address of the controller

SNMP Community & Version

Community and version of the SNMP agent

Monitored from

Poller used to monitor

Templates

Net-Aruba-Standard-Ap-SNMP-custom
The following host macros should be set as shown:
Macro Value

APNAME

Name of the access point
Check the *Create Services linked to the Template too* box and click on the *Save* button. The following services will be created: * Ap-Ssid-Statistics * Ap-Status

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle l'utilisation des disques du matériel}

{EN: Check storage device usages.}
service_templates.name: Net-Aruba-Standard-Storage-SNMP

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle l'utilisation mémoire du matériel}

{EN: Check machine memory usage.}
service_templates.name: Net-Aruba-Standard-Memory-SNMP

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle l'état des licences du contrôleur.}

{EN: Check the status of the licenses on the controller.}
service_templates.name: Net-Aruba-Standard-License-SNMP

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle l'ensemble du matériel ('ventilateur', 'modules', 'alimentations') de l'équipement.}

{EN: Check hardware status ('fan', 'module', 'power supply').}
service_templates.name: Net-Aruba-Standard-Hardware-Global-SNMP

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle du taux d'utilisation du CPU de la machine. Ce contrôle pourra remonter la moyenne du taux d'utilisation des CPU.}

{EN: Check the rate of utilization of CPU for the machine. This check can give the average utilization rate of CPU.}
service_templates.name: Net-Aruba-Standard-Cpu-SNMP

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle l'état des contrôleurs (fonctionne seulement sur le contrôleur maître).}

{EN: Check controllers status (works only on master controller).}
service_templates.name: Net-Aruba-Standard-Controller-Status-SNMP

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle l'état du ou des points d'accès.}

{EN: Check access points status.}
service_templates.name: Net-Aruba-Standard-Ap-Status-SNMP

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle les statistiques des ESSID et BSSID du ou des points d'accès.}

{EN: Check access points' ESSID and BSSID statistics.}
service_templates.name: Net-Aruba-Standard-Ap-Ssid-Statistics-SNMP

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle les ventilateurs de l'équipement.}

{EN: Check fan status on hardware.}
service_templates.name: Net-Aruba-Standard-Hardware-Fan-SNMP

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle les modules de l'équipement.}

{EN: Check module status on hardware.}
service_templates.name: Net-Aruba-Standard-Hardware-Module-SNMP

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle les alimentations de l'équipement.}

{EN: Check power supply status on hardware.}
service_templates.name: Net-Aruba-Standard-Hardware-Psu-SNMP

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle le pourcentage de paquets en erreur/écarté d'une interface réseau.}

{EN: Check packets on errors/discards of a network interface.}
service_templates.name: Net-Aruba-Standard-Packet-Errors-Generic-Id-SNMP

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle le pourcentage de paquets en erreur/écarté d'une interface réseau.}

{EN: Check packets on errors/discards of a network interface.}
service_templates.name: Net-Aruba-Standard-Packet-Errors-Generic-Name-SNMP

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle le pourcentage de paquets en erreur/écarté d'une interface réseau.}

{EN: Check packets on errors/discards of a network interface.}
service_templates.name: Net-Aruba-Standard-Packet-Errors-Global-SNMP

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle le traffic réseau d'une interface réseau.}

{EN: Check traffic of an network interface.}
service_templates.name: Net-Aruba-Standard-Traffic-Generic-Id-SNMP

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle le traffic réseau d'une interface réseau.}

{EN: Check traffic of an network interface.}
service_templates.name: Net-Aruba-Standard-Traffic-Generic-Name-SNMP

service_templates._comment:
{FR: Contrôle le traffic réseau d'une interface réseau.}

{EN: Check traffic of an network interface.}
service_templates.name: Net-Aruba-Standard-Traffic-Global-SNMP
